summary: A monkey like man found in the jungles of Congo is brought to Milan, Italy and is called Bingo Bongo. Only Laura, an anthropologist, believes in his human qualities.
cast: Adriano Celentano|Carole Bouquet|Felice Andreasi|Enzo Robutti|Walter D'Amore|Roberto Marelli|Alfio Patan√©|Elizabeth Cobben|Maurizio Tabani|Mario Barilla|Guido Spadea|Andrea Montuschi|Sal Borgese|Raffaele di Sipio|Memo Dittongo
title: Bingo Bongo
